data.name: Kree Royal Guard
data.description: A heavily armored Kree warrior who intercepts attackers with brutal counterattacks.

starItems.name: Kree Royal Guard
starItems.description: A heavily armored Kree warrior who intercepts attackers with brutal counterattacks.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage. Gain <color=#fff568>Counter</color>.

1.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Heal self for <color=#86e619>100</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health.

If Ronan is an ally, heal for an additional <color=#86e619>100</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>300</color> Healing

2.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies. Heal self for <color=#86e619>400</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health.

If Ronan is an ally, heal for an additional <color=#86e619>400</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health.

3.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies. Heal self for <color=#86e619>400</color> Health + <color=#86e619>7%</color> of Max Health.

If Ronan is an ally, heal for an additional <color=#86e619>400</color> Health + <color=#86e619>7%</color> of Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>400</color> Healing

4.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies. Heal self for <color=#86e619>800</color> Health + <color=#86e619>7%</color> of Max Health.

If Ronan is an ally, heal for an additional <color=#86e619>800</color> Health + <color=#86e619>7%</color> of Max Health.

5.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies. Heal self for <color=#86e619>1,300</color> Health + <color=#86e619>7%</color> of Max Health.

If Ronan is an ally, heal for an additional <color=#86e619>1,300</color> Health + <color=#86e619>7%</color> of Max Health.
5.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>3%</color> Healing

6.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies. Heal self for <color=#86e619>1,300</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.

If Ronan is an ally, heal for an additional <color=#86e619>1,300</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.

7.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>KREE</color> allies. Heal self for <color=#86e619>1,850</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.

If Ronan is an ally, heal for an additional <color=#86e619>1,850</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.

1.description:
While in <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, when attacked, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for a random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor per <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.

2.description:
While in <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, when attacked, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for a random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor. Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor per <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to generate Ability Energy

3.description:
While in <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, when attacked, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for a random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor. Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor per <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.

4.description:
While in <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, when attacked, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for a random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Armor. Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor per <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to generate Ability Energy

5.description:
While in <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, when attacked, <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for a random <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor. Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor per <color=#fff568>KREE</color> ally.
